title: Manganese-based nanozyme enables efficient mitigation of Huanglongbing-induced oxidative damage in Citrus
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00519H, Paper
Shuojun Li, Yuying Long, Guiyun Deng, Yinghui Men, Feifan Lu, Zihan Wang, Jiaying Li, He-you Han
Huanglongbing (HLB) is a severe disease in Citrus caused by Candidatus Liberibacter asiaticus (CLas) infection, which has brought about substantial economic losses in the global Citrus industry. Recently, HLB has...
